mapper.select: SELECT cd_iso_stato as cdNazione, ds_stato as dsNazione FROM ${database.schema}STATO
SELECT p.cd_provincia as cdProvincia, p.ds_provincia as dsProvincia, p.cd_sigla_prov as cdSiglaProv FROM ${database.schema}PROVINCIA as P ORDER BY p.ds_provincia

SELECT p.cd_provincia as cdProvincia, p.ds_provincia as dsProvincia, p.cd_sigla_prov as cdSiglaProv FROM ${database.schema}PROVINCIA as P,${database.schema}STATO S WHERE P.CD_ISO_STATO=S.CD_ISO_STATO AND S.CD_ISO_STATO='IT' ORDER BY p.ds_provincia

SELECT p.cd_provincia as cdProvincia, p.ds_provincia as dsProvincia, P.cd_sigla_prov as cdSiglaProv FROM ${database.schema}STATO S, ${database.schema}PROVINCIA P WHERE S.cd_iso_stato=#{cdIsoStato} AND S.cd_iso_stato=P.cd_iso_stato ORDER BY p.ds_provincia
SELECT C.cd_comune as cdComune, C.ds_comune as dsComune, C.cd_provincia as cdProvincia FROM ${database.schema}COMUNE C WHERE C.cd_provincia=#{cdProvincia} ORDER BY C.ds_comune

SELECT c.cd_comune as cdComune, c.ds_comune as dsComune, P.cd_provincia as cdProvincia FROM ${database.schema}COMUNE C, ${database.schema}STATO S, ${database.schema}PROVINCIA P WHERE S.cd_iso_stato=#{cdStato} AND S.cd_iso_stato=P.cd_iso_stato AND P.cd_provincia=C.cd_provincia ORDER BY c.ds_comune
SELECT id_tipo_incasso as idTipoIncasso, ds_tipo_incasso as dsTipoIncasso FROM ${database.schema}TIPO_INCASSO;
SELECT count(*) FROM ${database.schema}ANAGRAFICA A WHERE A.CD_FISC=#{cdFisc}
